text: Anaua () was a town of ancient Phrygia, later also known as Sanaos. It was located near a lake by the same name, now Lake Acıgöl. The town is located near modern Sarıkavak.entry at Pleiades ==References== Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:Populated places in Phrygia Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Afyonkarahisar Province Category:Dazkırı District
title: Anaua
